Title: Relates to the practice of physicians licensed in another state or territory of the United States pursuant to a reciprocal agreement
Summary: Authorizes physicians licensed in another state or territory of the United States to practice time-limited follow-up care via telehealth in NYS pursuant to a reciprocal agreement; requires annual authorization.
LawCode: Amd ยง6526, Ed L; amd ยง2999-cc, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the public health law, in relation to the practice of physicians licensed in another state or territory of the United States pursuant to a reciprocal agreement
